${modID}:ExampleCard.NAME: Name
${modID}:ExampleCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This will automatically be used if the card is upgraded. Remove it if unneeded.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: You can put more text in here.
If you need to use it for stuff.
Blizzard is a good example for this.

${modID}:GiveMeMoney.NAME: Begs for Money
${modID}:GiveMeMoney.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Ryo! NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. Unblocked damage is converted to Gold. NL Gain !${modID}:BAP! ${modID}:Bocchi_Anxiety. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:EatGrass_DEPRECATE.NAME: Eat Grass
${modID}:EatGrass_DEPRECATE.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Ryo! NL Lose !M! HP. Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:FireBocchi.NAME: Fire Bocchi
${modID}:FireBocchi.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Bocchi! NL Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable.

${modID}:SuperBocchi.NAME: Super Saiyan Bocchi
${modID}:SuperBocchi.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Bocchi! NL Remove !${modID}:BA1! ${modID}:Bocchi_Anxiety. NL Gain !M! Strength. NL Gain !M! Dexterity.

${modID}:BocchiScream.NAME: Bocchi's Scream
${modID}:BocchiScream.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Bocchi! NL Gain !${modID}:BA2! ${modID}:Bocchi_Anxiety. NL ALL enemies lose !M! Strength. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:GuitarHero.NAME: Guitar Hero
${modID}:GuitarHero.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Bocchi! Ethereal. NL The first ${modID}:Bocchi card you play each turn is played twice. NL Gain [E] at the start of each turn.
${modID}:GuitarHero.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Bocchi! NL The first ${modID}:Bocchi card you play each turn is played twice. NL Gain [E] at the start of each turn.

${modID}:BocchiLeapOfFaith.NAME: Leap of Faith
${modID}:BocchiLeapOfFaith.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Bocchi! NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Gain !M! ${modID}:Bocchi_Anxiety.

${modID}:Swing.NAME: Power Strum
${modID}:Swing.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Kita! NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Gain !${modID}:GRV! ${modID}:Groove.

${modID}:FollowUpNijika.NAME: Nijika Follow-up
${modID}:FollowUpNijika.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Nijika! NL Deal !D! damage. NL If the last card played this combat was an Attack, draw !M! cards.

${modID}:BocchiGhost.NAME: Ghost Bocchi
${modID}:BocchiGhost.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Bocchi! NL Gain !M! Intangible. NL Gain !${modID}:BAP! ${modID}:Bocchi_Anxiety. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:CalmHeadBocchi.NAME: Coolheaded
${modID}:CalmHeadBocchi.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Bocchi! NL Gain !B! Block. NL Draw !M! cards.

${modID}:JawPoke.NAME: Jaw Poke
${modID}:JawPoke.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Bocchi! NL Deal !D! damage to a random enemy !M! times. NL Each hit applies 1 Vulnerable.

${modID}:IfConstellation.NAME: Constellation
${modID}:IfConstellation.DESCRIPTION: Consume all ${modID}:Groove. NL Deal !M! times ${modID}:Groove_Damage. NL Choose to enter a ${modID}:Member's_Solo.

${modID}:ShowBelly.NAME: Show Belly
${modID}:ShowBelly.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Bocchi! NL Apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies. NL Remove !B! Block from self. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:KitaKita.NAME: Kita~Kita~
${modID}:KitaKita.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Kita! NL ${modID}:Stun an enemy. NL Enter ${modID}:Kita's_Solo. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:MuliMuli.NAME: Muli Muli
${modID}:MuliMuli.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Bocchi! NL Deal !D! damage. Gain !${modID}:GRV! ${modID}:Groove. NL Place a copy of this card in your discard pile.

${modID}:SacrificeBocchi.NAME: Bocchi Seppuku
${modID}:SacrificeBocchi.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Bocchi! NL Gain !${modID}:BAP! ${modID}:Bocchi_Anxiety. NL Gain [E] [E]. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:SacrificeBocchi.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Bocchi! NL Gain !${modID}:BAP! ${modID}:Bocchi_Anxiety. NL Gain [E] [E] [E]. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:RyoEatEat.NAME: Have Some Snacks
${modID}:RyoEatEat.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Ryo! NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Gain !M! Max HP for each enemy killed. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:MuscleNijika.NAME: Whiplash
${modID}:MuscleNijika.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Nijika! NL Remove all ${modID}:Groove. NL Gain 1 Strength for every !M! ${modID}:Groove removed. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:FallenAngel.NAME: Fallen Angel
${modID}:FallenAngel.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Nijika! NL Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Weak. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Gain !${modID}:GRV! ${modID}:Groove.

${modID}:ShimokitaAngel.NAME: Angel of Shimokita
${modID}:ShimokitaAngel.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Nijika! NL Remove !M! ${modID}:Bocchi_Anxiety at the start of each turn. NL Enter ${modID}:Nijika's_Solo.

${modID}:RyoQuickWrite.NAME: Ryo Speed Writing
${modID}:RyoQuickWrite.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Ryo! NL Draw cards until your hand is full. NL Lose !M! ${modID}:Groove. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:NijikaMiddleFinger.NAME: Middle Finger
${modID}:NijikaMiddleFinger.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Nijika! NL Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !${modID}:GRV! ${modID}:Groove. NL Enter ${modID}:Nijika's_Solo.

${modID}:KitaGone.NAME: Kita and Ikuyo
${modID}:KitaGone.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Kita! NL Lose !M! Max HP. NL When you would die, prevent death and heal to 50% of Max HP.

${modID}:PinkBocchi.NAME: Pink-Hair Guitarist
${modID}:PinkBocchi.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Bocchi! NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies X times. NL If ${modID}:Bocchi_Anxiety is less than !M!, X is increased by 1.

${modID}:RyoSuit.NAME: Ryo in Suit
${modID}:RyoSuit.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Ryo! NL Add 2 Ryo's Henchman to your hand. NL Enter ${modID}:Ryo's_Solo.
${modID}:RyoSuit.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Ryo! NL Add 2 Ryo's Henchman+ to your hand. NL Enter ${modID}:Ryo's_Solo.

${modID}:RyoHenchman1.NAME: Ryo's Henchman - Death
${modID}:RyoHenchman1.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:RyoHenchman2.NAME: Ryo's Henchman - Demon
${modID}:RyoHenchman2.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Weak. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:BocchiDraw.NAME: Seek
${modID}:BocchiDraw.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Bocchi! NL Lose !M! ${modID}:Groove. NL Draw all ${modID}:Bocchi cards from your draw pile.

${modID}:RyoThumbUp.NAME: Ryo's Appreciation
${modID}:RyoThumbUp.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Ryo! NL Gain !${modID}:GRV! ${modID}:Groove at the start of each turn.
${modID}:RyoThumbUp.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Ryo! Innate. NL Gain !${modID}:GRV! ${modID}:Groove at the start of each turn.

${modID}:KitaPipa.NAME: Pipa Vocal
${modID}:KitaPipa.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Kita! NL Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Weak. NL Gain !${modID}:GRV! ${modID}:Groove.

${modID}:KitaRap.NAME: Kita Rap
${modID}:KitaRap.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Kita! NL Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Gain !${modID}:GRV! ${modID}:Groove.

${modID}:SixStringBass.NAME: Six-String Bass
${modID}:SixStringBass.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Kita! NL Deal !D! damage. NL Lose !${modID}:GRV! ${modID}:Groove. NL Gain !M! ${modID}:Distortion.

${modID}:FatherTear.NAME: Father's Tears
${modID}:FatherTear.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Remove !M! ${modID}:Bocchi_Anxiety. NL Gain !${modID}:GRV! ${modID}:Groove.

${modID}:KikuriWave.NAME: Kikuri Wave
${modID}:KikuriWave.DESCRIPTION: For each enemy, remove !M! ${modID}:Bocchi_Anxiety and gain !${modID}:GRV! ${modID}:Groove. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:KikuriWave.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL For each enemy, remove !M! ${modID}:Bocchi_Anxiety and gain !${modID}:GRV! ${modID}:Groove. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:OctopusBocchi.NAME: Octopus Bocchi
${modID}:OctopusBocchi.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Bocchi! NL Gain !B! Block. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Gain !${modID}:BAP! ${modID}:Bocchi_Anxiety.

${modID}:FadeAway.NAME: Fade Away
${modID}:FadeAway.DESCRIPTION: Deal 6 base damage. NL Deal !M! additional damage for each ${modID}:Bocchi_Anxiety.

${modID}:NijikaThumbUp.NAME: Angel's Thumb Up
${modID}:NijikaThumbUp.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Nijika! NL Remove !${modID}:BASE! ${modID}:Bocchi_Anxiety. NL If ${modID}:Bocchi_Anxiety is greater than !${modID}:THRESHOLD!, remove !${modID}:BONUS! additional. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:BocchiRiff.NAME: Improvised Riff
${modID}:BocchiRiff.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Bocchi! NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Gain !${modID}:GRV! ${modID}:Groove. NL Remove !${modID}:BAP! ${modID}:Bocchi_Anxiety. NL Enter ${modID}:Bocchi's_Solo.

${modID}:BocchiOrKita.NAME: BocchiKita
${modID}:BocchiOrKita.DESCRIPTION: Choose to enter ${modID}:Bocchi's_Solo or ${modID}:Kita's_Solo. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:BocchiOrKita.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Choose to enter ${modID}:Bocchi's_Solo or ${modID}:Kita's_Solo. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:NijikaOrRyo.NAME: NijikaRyo
${modID}:NijikaOrRyo.DESCRIPTION: Choose to enter ${modID}:Nijika's_Solo or ${modID}:Ryo's_Solo. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:NijikaOrRyo.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Choose to enter ${modID}:Nijika's_Solo or ${modID}:Ryo's_Solo. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:DominationKita.NAME: Domination Devil
${modID}:DominationKita.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Kita! NL Deal !M! damage for each ${modID}:Bocchi card in hand. NL Gain !${modID}:DISTOR! ${modID}:Distortion.

${modID}:KitaKira.NAME: Kita Kira
${modID}:KitaKira.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Kita! NL Apply !M! Vulnerable to ALL enemies. NL Apply !${modID}:SELF! Vulnerable to yourself. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:BocchiHeartbeat.NAME: Beating Engine
${modID}:BocchiHeartbeat.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Bocchi! NL Draw !M! cards. NL Gain !${modID}:GRV! ${modID}:Groove. NL Shuffle a *Burn into your draw pile.

${modID}:RyoPray.NAME: Ryo's Prayer
${modID}:RyoPray.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Ryo! NL Deal !D! damage. NL Can only be played if you have no ${modID}:Kita cards in hand.

${modID}:BocchiAtWork.NAME: Working Bocchi
${modID}:BocchiAtWork.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Bocchi! NL Gain !M! Gold. NL Gain !${modID}:BAP! ${modID}:Bocchi_Anxiety. NL Gain !${modID}:DIST! ${modID}:Distortion. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:NijikaGambade.NAME: Nijika Cheer Up
${modID}:NijikaGambade.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Nijika! NL Gain [E] for every !M! ${modID}:Groove. NL Enter ${modID}:Nijika's_Solo.

${modID}:BocchiOmelette.NAME: Evil Omelette Rice
${modID}:BocchiOmelette.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Bocchi! NL At the start of each turn, apply !M! Poison to ALL enemies and gain !${modID}:BAP! ${modID}:Bocchi_Anxiety.

${modID}:FleeGuitarist.NAME: Fled Guitarist
${modID}:FleeGuitarist.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Kita! NL Gain !B! Block. NL If you have ${modID}:Distortion, gain [E].
${modID}:FleeGuitarist.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Kita! NL Gain !B! Block. NL If you have ${modID}:Distortion, gain [E] [E].

${modID}:KaraKara.NAME: Kara Kara
${modID}:KaraKara.DESCRIPTION: Double your ${modID}:Groove. NL Enter ${modID}:Ryo's_Solo. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Bandman.NAME: Band Man
${modID}:Bandman.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Block for each ${modID}:Groove. NL Lose !M! ${modID}:Groove.

${modID}:Bandman_DEPRECATE.NAME: Band Person_DEPRECATE
${modID}:Bandman_DEPRECATE.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Remove all ${modID}:Groove. NL Gain 1 Gold for each ${modID}:Groove removed. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:WormBocchi.NAME: Hammerhead Snake
${modID}:WormBocchi.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Bocchi! NL Gain 1 Intangible for each ${modID}:Bocchi_Anxiety. NL ${modID}:Bocchi_Anxiety can no longer be removed.

${modID}:GuitarLonelinessBluePlanet.NAME: Guitar, Loneliness, Blue Planet
${modID}:GuitarLonelinessBluePlanet.DESCRIPTION: Choose: Gain !${modID}:GRV! ${modID}:Groove, !M! ${modID}:Distortion, or remove !${modID}:BAP! ${modID}:Bocchi_Anxiety. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:KitaBocchiStyle.NAME: Bocchified Kita
${modID}:KitaBocchiStyle.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Kita! Ethereal. NL Gain !M! ${modID}:Distortion for each ${modID}:Bocchi card in hand.

${modID}:DarwinKita.NAME: Darwin Kita
${modID}:DarwinKita.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Kita! NL Choose !M! ${modID}:Bocchi cards from your draw pile to add to your hand. NL They cost 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:FantasyDisco.NAME: Lonely Disco
${modID}:FantasyDisco.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Bocchi_Fantasy. NL At the end of turn, take !D! damage and gain !${modID}:GRV! ${modID}:Groove.

${modID}:FantasyGeisha.NAME: Lonely Geisha
${modID}:FantasyGeisha.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Bocchi_Fantasy. NL At the end of turn, deal !D! damage to ALL enemies and yourself, gain !${modID}:GRV! ${modID}:Groove.

${modID}:FantasyStone.NAME: Lonely Medusa
${modID}:FantasyStone.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Bocchi_Fantasy. NL At the end of turn, gain !B! Block and gain !${modID}:BAP! ${modID}:Bocchi_Anxiety.

${modID}:FantasySurf.NAME: Lonely Surfing
${modID}:FantasySurf.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Bocchi_Fantasy. NL At the end of turn, gain !M! Vulnerable and gain !${modID}:GRV! ${modID}:Groove.

${modID}:BocchiQuickDraw.NAME: Quick Draw
${modID}:BocchiQuickDraw.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Bocchi! NL Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Discard any drawn cards that don't increase ${modID}:Groove.

${modID}:RollingRolling.NAME: Morning Light Falls on You
${modID}:RollingRolling.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! ${modID}:Groove and !B! Block for each ${modID}:Bocchi_Anxiety. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:RollingRolling.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Gain !M! ${modID}:Groove and !B! Block for each ${modID}:Bocchi_Anxiety. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:NijikaEnergyDrink.NAME: Energy Drink
${modID}:NijikaEnergyDrink.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Nijika! NL Gain !B! Block. NL Gain [E] next turn.

${modID}:NeverForget.NAME: Never Forget
${modID}:NeverForget.DESCRIPTION: The first time you switch ${modID}:Solo each turn, gain [E].

${modID}:WhatIsWrongWith.NAME: What's Wrong With
${modID}:WhatIsWrongWith.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card that reduces ${modID}:Bocchi_Anxiety, draw !M! cards.

${modID}:Distortion.NAME: Distortion!!
${modID}:Distortion.DESCRIPTION: Deal 16 base damage. NL Deal !M! additional damage for each ${modID}:Distortion.

${modID}:EatGrass.NAME: Eat Grass
${modID}:EatGrass.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Ryo! NL Deal !D! damage. NL If you have less than !M! Gold, play this card again. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:IntoTheLight.NAME: Into The Light
${modID}:IntoTheLight.DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of 3 random Skill cards to add to your hand. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:IntoTheLight.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of 3 random Skill cards to add to your hand. It costs 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.
